ing: 1/2 cup frozen mixed peas and carrots
salt and black pepper to taste
des: "Ravioli in chicken broth. A great way to use up any extra veggies or leftover meats hanging around in the fridge. Use any kind of ravioli you like. Oyster sauce can substitute for soy sauce."
ins: In a large saucepan, bring water and bouillon cube to a boil. Place ravioli in the pot, and cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Mix in spinach, mushrooms, carrot, frozen peas and carrots, olive oil, and soy sauce; cook for 5 minutes, until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper.
